items.sentence: I hope you liked it here and will come back soon.
I just ordered a coffee, because I wasn't hungry.
I'd planned to leave for Boston the next morning.
I think it's best that you should know the truth.
I think that games like this are a waste of time.
Tom and I haven't seen each other in a long time.
Tom practices playing the piano almost every day.
I haven't been to a movie theater in a long time.
Tom was the one who taught me how to milk a goat.
The bus service is not good between nine and ten.
